snippets.snippet: IN SINTRA, A CULINARY JOURNEY THROUGH ITALY. To travel to Italy, one needn’t leave Portugal. At Penha Longa Mercatto restaurant, just outside of Lisbon, chefs craft dishes reminiscent of their own Italian adventures. Pulling from the country’s 20 regions, the restaurant infuses the classics with new flavors using fresh ingredients.
snippets.title: IN SINTRA, A CULINARY JOURNEY THROUGH ITALY - The Ritz-Carlton

snippets.snippet: Situado entre colinas, jardins exuberantes e tranquilos lagos, o Penha Longa Resort, um dos resorts de luxo mais impressionantes de Portugal, oferece uma rara oportunidade de explorar a beleza deslumbrante das montanhas de Sintra.
snippets.title: Penha Longa Mercatto | Penha Longa Resort

snippets.snippet: O Penha Longa Mercatto tem comida e vinho das vinte regiões de Itália. Tem carpaccio, caprese, burrata, minestroni, mozzarella de bufala DOP, prosciutto de Parma, focaccia, spaguetti, gnochi, massas diversas, oito tipos de risotto, pizzas, pannacotta, tiramisú… Mais italiano impossível.

snippets.snippet: Some of the world’s best restaurants can be found at this remote Sintra resort. The crown jewels of the collection are Midori, the only Asian restaurant in Portugal to be awarded a Michelin star, and the Michelin-starred LAB, Chef Sergi Arola's namesake restaurant.
